mapper.insert: insert into complete (task_complete_id,task_id, create_user_id, create_time, content) values (#{taskCompleteId}, #{taskId}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime}, #{content})
mapper.select: select complete.ids, task_complete_id, task_id, create_user_id, create_user.name as create_user_name, complete.create_time, content, read_time, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, process_result, process_remark, process_time, process_read_time from (complete left join user_info create_user on create_user_id = user_id) left join user_info process_user on process_user_id = process_user.user_id where 1 = 1 and task_id = #{taskId} order by complete.ids desc
